scripts.playground:server: export NODE_ENV=development TYPE=playground && yarn initiate &&  webpack-dev-server
scripts.playground:prod: export NODE_ENV=production TYPE=playground && yarn initiate && webpack-dev-server
scripts.playground:dev: export NODE_ENV=development TYPE=playground && yarn initiate && webpack-dev-server
scripts.playground:build: export NODE_ENV=production TYPE=playground && yarn initiate && webpack
scripts.share:prod: export NODE_ENV=production && export TYPE=share && yarn initiate && webpack-dev-server
scripts.share:dev: export NODE_ENV=development && export TYPE=share && yarn initiate && webpack-dev-server
scripts.share:build: export NODE_ENV=production && export TYPE=share && yarn initiate && webpack
scripts.render:dev: export NODE_ENV=development && export TYPE=render && yarn initiate && webpack-dev-server
scripts.render:build: export NODE_ENV=production && export TYPE=render && yarn initiate && webpack
scripts.test:build: export NODE_ENV=development TYPE=testing && yarn initiate && webpack
scripts.test:dev: export NODE_ENV=development TYPE=testing && yarn initiate && webpack-dev-server
